item.description:
Hello Ghouls and Goblins LOL,
Ready for a Halloween Adventure!!

If your interested in joining us for Studio Square's Halloween Party "Fear Garden," on October 30th, or just want a group to join for Halloween costume shopping, don't go costume hunting alone, join several of us for costume shopping on Sunday October 24th @ 2pm... We will be starting our hunt at:
1st New York Costumes located at 104 4th Ave and 808 Broadway (@ 11th street) http://www.halloweena...
2nd Ricky's 466 6TH AVENUE, (BETWEEN 11TH AND 12TH ST.)

CUPCAKES!!!
After we've exhausted ourselves from the shopping frenzy, let's stroll over to Crumbs in Union Square to have a delicious and well deserved treat!
THE FIRST TWO LADIES TO SIGN UP FOR THIS EVENT & VOTE IN THE CURRENT GROUPS POLL WILL GET 1 CUPCAKE FREE!!

So Let's Get to Signing Up Ladies!
Looking Forward to It!!
Lisa :)

FYI, All locations are within walking distance of each other!
-To vote in our Poll on this site, please look above under the "More" Box and select Poll
-Address to Crumbs...
124 University Pl
(between 13th St & 14th St)
New York, NY 10003
item.how_to_find_us: I will provide my cell when it comes closer to the event...
item.name: Halloween Costume Shopping & Crumbs! First 2 Signups get FREE Cupcake !
